title: Educational Policies: Privatisation & Marketisation ðŸ’° - A Level Sociology Learning & Revision
description:
Emma looks at the concepts of neoliberalism and globalisation on the privatisation and marketisation in schools. She also looks at the difference between endogenous and exogenous privatisation. Ideal for preparing you for your A Level Sociology exam.

Click here for the full course, or visit this link: http://bit.ly/30id5tm
